title: Blue Essence Earning Suggestion
body:
Hi,

I am making this post as I have heard and seen a lot of negative feedback from players regarding the new system of earning blue essence.

It feels like League of Legends has become a grind to level up, as it is the only way to get significant amounts of blue essence, which is now used a lot more than IP ever was. 

Riot, you have made several changes regarding "not making LoL a grind" especially from 1-30, as YOU IDENTIFIED it as a significant barrier for new players to join the game. But with this new system, your experienced players now are having this experience forced onto them.

I understand the idea behind unlimited leveling, and larger rewards at milestones. However, when each level takes ~2500xp just after level 30, without first win of the day bonus it takes about 15-20 games to EARN ANY BLUE ESSENCE AT ALL!!! This is insane.

I saw the change made to the first win of the day bonus today on OCE, as part of patch 7.23, but it is not nearly enough. You are promoting people playing on multiple accounts, and playing one game a day as the first win of the day is the only way to level up without spamming/grinding tons of games. 

Rather than having so much focus on the first win of the day, I propose something along the lines of the following system:
1. First and foremost, BRING BACK rewards after each game. A small amount of blue essence is all we need (25-50 ish). This encourages people to play regularly. 
2. Reduce the first win of the day bonus more, but slightly increase the XP per game. Rather than earning 700ish (total) for first win of the day,  and earning around 150-200 for other games, bring the exp closer to 500 total for first win of the day, and around 200-300 for each game. This way people are encouraged to play mutliple games in a row, rather than jumping on once a day. 
3. Set a minimum blue essence amount for leveling up, that is actually significant. Maybe 400ish? And the chance to win 1-3 champion capsules. This way people aren't grinding a whole bunch of games to get unlucky and being disappointed in all the time they just spent aiming to level up.

TLDR; Not enough essence. Add essence per game, reduce first win of the day in favour of higher rewards after each game. DONT MAKE LEAGUE OF LEGENDS A GRIND. IT IS THE ONE THING IT NEVER HAS BEEN, BUT IT IS THREATENING TO BECOME JUST THAT!

Thankyou,
Dylan

replies.body: In addition to this, tack on a little extra BE for the most honourable player on the team. Gives more weight to the honour system and entices people to play better.

I was thinking that it would be good if Riot can give us missions in which if we complete it, we will gain Blue Essence.
Don't know what other missions Riot would bring into the mission panel later on, but if we can get some Blue Essence by completing missions, that would be fine too, except if they are going to do this, they may not make the mission too easy if it grants a large amount of Blue Essence, and easy missions may give you a certain amount of Blue Essence only. Otherwise they may give you missions based on playing one or more game in the rotating game mode, but it only gives you Blue Essence if you win.
If this happens, then it is better than nothing.

If you do the math..... the higher exp by 150 per first win vs the 50BE straight up. 150exp wins every time as it is the equivalent of one game 25 minutes long won. 50 BE is also about this level.
However levelling up actually gives you more than the old system would have per number of games as proven by RIOT.
Therefore getting that extra exp game feels better so in long run way more BE.
This game died with 7.22 patch, why are we still playing?
I still don't have all the champions and it's going to be impossible for me to get all the champions I want now. So I agree.

From my previous suggestion, Riot is actually giving out Project missions, and if you complete it, you gain tokens, and you can use the token to get Blue Essence, simply go to your loot, click on the Project Token icon, and you will see Blue essence listed as one of the things you can redeem for, 1 token gives you 20 Blue Essence. Time Limited, be quick for this, even though it may not grant you much Blue Essence overall, it is at least something, still better than nothing. If you want to get Blue Essence as fast as possible, I strongly recommend you to go and complete missions.

The missions to BE conversion rate is terrible though, as it always is.

240 BE = Key Fragment
640 BE = Project Champion Orb (Champion shard, chance to get a second)
960 BE = Skin Shard + Orange Essence (plus potentially another orb, an emote, a gemstone, or a "hextech exclusive skin shard)
1280 BE = Project skin shard (not the new ones)
1600 BE = Icon + Three Hunters borders

Out of these, the only one i wouldn't trade the BE for what is a potential drop, is the Icon + borders the rest are totally worth way more then the BE.
Bro math is always so fail.
